ygData.subject: Lianna's flute
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Talies, It s found off of Regis, a rare spawn in North Karana. Kill Zahal the Vile (another rare spawn in North Karana) to make Regis spawn. The flute is a
ygData.messageBody:
> Lianna's Flute (Unknown where this is found) Wind instrument
> - no known special effects.

Talies,

It's found off of Regis, a rare spawn in North Karana. Kill Zahal the Vile (another rare spawn in North Karana) to make Regis spawn.

The flute is a quest item which you give to the gyspsy, Lianna Ferasa, in Rathe Mtns in return for the Icon of the Reverent, which is required for the Cleric's Bracers of the Reverent quest from the Temple of Solusek Ro.

Sorry, never tested it for effects.

Also, I may have missed it, but have you included your url for the various commands? It's a very handy list that would help with the twisting commands.

Windleaf
